resources.string: Benefits of Camel Pose: Reduces fat on thighs. Opens up the hips, stretching deep hip flexors. Stretches and strengthens the shoulders and back. Expands the abdominal region, improving digestion and elimination.
Benefits of snake pose: Strengthens your spine Stimulates abdominal organs Reduces belly fat Manage stress Improves circulation

Benefits of Chakrasana: Strengthens liver, pancreas and kidneys. Excellent for heart. Good for infertility, asthma and osteoporosis. Strengthens arms, shoulders, hands, wrists and legs. Stretches the chest and lungs. Strengthens the arms and wrists, legs.
benefits of sn: Helps lose weight Helps strengthen muscles and joints Gives glowing skin Ensures a better functioning digestive system
